page.title: 12OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES
page.content: { FOOTBALL}IN NEWBIGGIN HAS BEEN INEXTRICABLY LINKED WITH INDUSTRY IN THE PAST.OF THE SEVERAL NEWBIGGIN {SATURDAY SIDES}COMPOSED MAINLY OF MINERS IN THE FIRST HALF OF THE TWENTIENTH CENTURY ONLY ONE NOW REMAINS-NEWBIGGIN CENTRAL WELFARE F.C.WHO WILL COMPETE IN THE NORTHERN {AMATEUR LEAGUE}FOR THE FIRST TIME NEXT SEASON. IN CONTRAST TO THE DECLINE OF THE INDUSTRIALLY PROMOTED SIDES,THE POPULARITY OF SOCIAL CLUB SPONSORED SUNDAY LEAGUE SIDES HAS MAINTAINED THE GAME AS THE MOST POPULAR WINTER RECREATION OF THE REMAINING INDUSTRIAL WORKING-CLASSES AND UNEMPLOYMENT{YOUTH FACILITIES FOR THE GAME IN THE TOWN, FALL UNDER JURISDICTION OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT, AS THE NOW DEFUNCT C.I.S.W.O.ORGANISATION WHICH RELIED ALMOST ENTIRELY UPON MINERS' SUBSCRIPTIONS IN THE PAST.
